name: biked
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
bike
[ I ] informal to go somewhere by bicycle: Do you want to bike to the park, or walk?
[ T ] UK to use a motorcycle to take something to someone: We biked a copy over to Greg at the BBC.
